name: Mad Cat's World
detailed_description:
Edjenerium, 2048.

Night club "RGB" for modern and fashionable, vegetarians, hipsters and other informal dudes, subject to the fashionable trends of their time.

Our hero Vasily just bought a new, fashioned, vegan hoverbike "Morkotron 3000".

- Be careful! - friends tell him after celebrate the purchase - Nights are insidious in August!

- Yeah, - Vasily wave off and drive his hoverbike to home in the retro district of the Edjenerium, - What can go wrong?

It would seem, and where are the pussycats? =)

An exciting 2D Point-and-Click in the not far future!
Sparkling sense of humor (sarcasm including)!
Interesting puzzles!
Charismatic characters!
A fascinating adventure for true lovers of stories and quests!

short_description: Welcome to the year 2048 and the town of Edjenerium, in which everything is not so simple as it seems to its inhabitants.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1000 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have a sense of humor \ Обязательно наличие чувства юмора
